des:
SÛLION CONNECTING LIVES range allows you to communicate by voice or through the internet with everyday objects, at any time and from anywhere.

Connect your SULION products to Alexa in a few simple steps:
1. Download our "SULION IoT" app in app market, then register an account (or log in directly if you already have an account);
2. Configure our devices in "SULION IoT" app and change appropriate name for your devices;
3. Enable "SULION IoT" skill on Alexa app, you'll be navigated to the login page, follow the instructions on the page to complete linking;
4. Tell Echo "Alexa, discover my devices". Wait for Echo to say "Search complete";
5. Now all setup is finished. You can enjoy the voice control on your home devices like these:
Alexa, turn on the bedroom light.
Alexa, turn off the plug.
Alexa, set the bedroom light to 50%.
Alexa, brighten the bedroom light to 50%.
Alexa, dim the bedroom light to 50%.
Alexa, set the bedroom light to green.

- You can configure all your devices and adapt them to your needs. Dim the lighting to see a movie, program the turning on of your ceiling fan on hot days or turn off all electrical appliances when you are away from home.
